```diff
*** Begin Patch
*** Update File: /Users/seandavey/Downloads/freestyle/freestyle-october/assets/iframe/size-twin-gallery.html
@@
   <script>
-    const heroImages = document.querySelectorAll('.hero-img[data-local-src]');
-    heroImages.forEach((img)=>{
-      const localSrc = img.dataset.localSrc;
-      const fallback = img.dataset.fallbackSrc || img.src;
-      if(!localSrc) return;
-      const probe = new Image();

-      probe.onerror = ()=>{img.src = fallback;};
-      probe.src = localSrc;
-    });
+    const heroImages = document.querySelectorAll('.hero-img[data-local-src]');
+    heroImages.forEach((img)=>{
+      const localSrc = img.dataset.localSrc;
+      const fallback = img.dataset.fallbackSrc || img.src;
+      if(!localSrc) return;
+      const probe = new Image();
+      probe.onload = ()=>{img.src = localSrc;};
+      probe.onerror = ()=>{img.src = fallback;};
+      probe.src = localSrc;
+    });
+
+    // Lightweight carousel controls
+    document.querySelectorAll('.carousel').forEach((car)=>{
+      const slides = Array.from(car.querySelectorAll('.slide'));
+      const dots = Array.from(car.querySelectorAll('.dot'));
+      let index = 0;
+
+      const setIndex = (i)=>{
+        index = (i + slides.length) % slides.length;
+        slides.forEach((s,si)=>s.classList.toggle('active', si===index));
+        dots.forEach((d,di)=>d.classList.toggle('active', di===index));
+      };
+
+      const next = ()=> setIndex(index+1);
+      const prev = ()=> setIndex(index-1);
+
+      car.querySelector('.nav.right')?.addEventListener('click', next);
+      car.querySelector('.nav.left')?.addEventListener('click', prev);
+      dots.forEach((d,di)=>d.addEventListener('click', ()=>setIndex(di)));
+
+      // Swipe support
+      let startX = null;
+      const onStart = (e)=>{ startX = (e.touches? e.touches[0].clientX : e.clientX); };
+      const onEnd = (e)=>{
+        if(startX===null) return;
+        const endX = (e.changedTouches? e.changedTouches[0].clientX : e.clientX);
+        const dx = endX - startX;
+        if(Math.abs(dx) > 30){ dx < 0 ? next() : prev(); }
+        startX = null;
+      };
+      car.addEventListener('mousedown', onStart);
+      car.addEventListener('mouseup', onEnd);
+      car.addEventListener('touchstart', onStart, {passive:true});
+      car.addEventListener('touchend', onEnd);
+    });
   </script>
*** End Patch
```
